column4: guys is there a difference (even if minimal) between installing a command-line system with the alternate CD and installing it from the server CD ?
i thought the alternate cd was the server cd
no , the alternate also installs ubuntu Desktop
I think you are confused. alternate install a cli system no GUI
it's text mode installation....but the final system is with GUI
then it is I who is confused hehe
yes :)  ...but the alternate CD can let you choose if you want a text-mode system or a full system with a GUI
I already downloaded the server CD and I have very slow connection :(
so use the serve cd. either way they are both ubuntu
there must be some small differences
probably but surely can be fixed with apt-get install...
the server cd installs !LAMP by default IIRC
gotta go. have a nice day folks
